member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.WebUserActivityDesigner
member.summary: Web Menu Control Design Time Interface

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.HiddenFilter
member.summary: This property can be used to filter the results shown in the tree. This property can be set to any valid SQL Expression, and the expression will automatically be wrapped in parenthesis and added to the end of each query as the tree is loaded

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.Entity
member.summary: Set/Get the Entity to load information from

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.DisplayField
member.summary: Set/Get the Field within the entity that will be displayed in the tree to the user

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.KeyField
member.summary: Set/Get the field within the entity that contains the primary key of the entity (usually ID)

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.ParentField
member.summary: Set/Get the field within the entity that provides the linkage to the parent level in the hierarchy (usually ParentID)

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.RootID
member.summary: Set/Get the Root ID in the tree to display. If left at the default of -1, the entire entity contents are displayed

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.OrderBy
member.summary: Set the Order By clause to sort the tree display. If no value is provided then it will sort on isName field of the Entity (Please Provide only coma seperated Field Name(s)).

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.HoverNodeCursor
member.summary: Set the mouse pointer used when hovered over a node.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyHierarchyTree.GetEntityInfo(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Utility method that returns (via OUT parameters) the Base Database and Base View for a given entity
